If data is and , it’s and scientists are more likely to in it.
4) are both repeatable and reproducible AND they .
They come from experiments that were designed to be a ...
1) Data based on isn’t as good as data based on large samples. A sample should
the (i.e. it should share as many of the characteristics in the population as possible) —
a small sample can’t do that as well. It’s also harder to spot if your sample size is too small.
2) The the sample size the , but scientists have to be when choosing how big.
For example, if you were studying the effects of a chemical used to sterilise water on the people drinking
it, it’d be great to study who was drinking the water (a huge sample), but it’d take ages and
cost a bomb. It’s more realistic to study a thousand people, with a mixture of ages, gender
This is no high street survey — it’s a designer investigation...
Not only do you need to be able to plan your own investigations, you should also be able to look at someone else’s
plan and decide whether or not it needs improving. Those examiners aren’t half demanding.
1) Scientists things and come up with to explain them (see p.2).
You need to be able to do the same. For example:
2) To whether or not a hypothesis is , you need to do an to gather
evidence. To do this, you need to use your hypothesis to make a — something you
think that you can test. E.g. people who have bigger feet will have more spots.
Investigations are used to see if there are or between, e.g. to
see if there’s a pattern or relationship between the variables ‘number of spots’ and ‘size of feet’.
To Make an Investigation a You Have to
1) In a lab experiment you usually and how it affects .
2) To make it a fair test, that could affect the results should
wise you can’t tell if the thing you’re changing is causing the results or not.
3) The variable you is called the variable.
The variable you when you change the independent variable is the variable.
The variables that you are called variables.
You could find how affects by measuring the formed over time.
The is the . The is the produced.
include the and of reactants, the you measure, etc.
6) Because you can’t always control all the variables, you often need to use a . This is
an experiment that’s kept under the as the rest of the investigation, but have
anything to it. This is so that you can see what happens when you don’t change anything at all.
: People have big feet and spots. : Having big feet causes spots.
